meanings.definition: The quality or state of being soporiferous.
meanings.sent1: The soporiferousnesses of the medicine helped me fall asleep quickly.
meanings.sent2: The soporiferousnesses of the lullaby made the baby drift off to sleep.
meanings.sent3: The soporiferousnesses of the boring lecture almost put me into a deep slumber.
meanings.sent4: The soporiferousnesses of the gentle rain lulled me into a peaceful nap.
meanings.sent5: The soporiferousnesses of the warm blanket wrapped around me like a cozy cocoon.

meanings.definition: The ability to induce sleep or drowsiness.
meanings.sent1: The strong soporiferousnesses of the sleeping pill knocked me out cold.
meanings.sent2: The soporiferousnesses of the bedtime story helped the children relax and doze off.
meanings.sent3: The soporiferousnesses of the boring movie made everyone in the room yawn.
meanings.sent4: The soporiferousnesses of the gentle music eased my mind into a peaceful slumber.
meanings.sent5: The soporiferousnesses of the cool breeze whispered me into a tranquil sleep.

meanings.sent1: The soporiferousnesses of the warm milk before bed made me feel sleepy.
meanings.sent2: The soporiferousnesses of the cozy blanket wrapped around me made me drowsy.
meanings.sent3: The soporiferousnesses of the monotonous voice on the radio almost put me to sleep.
meanings.sent4: The soporiferousnesses of the gentle rocking motion of the boat lulled me into a light doze.
meanings.sent5: The soporiferousnesses of the lavender scent in the room filled me with a sense of calm and drowsiness.
